abstract.t: Although QoS is identified as a very important requirement for L3PPVPNs (see for example [PPVPN-REQ]), the proposed L3 PPVPN solutions([2547bis], [VR], [CE-based]) have paid very little attention todescribing how the proposed approach fulfills the QoS requirements.This document explores different points of view, describesdependencies and orthogonalities, and details a number of solutionsand guidelines.
